name: gerrit-review-push
description: Gerrit helper: pick a commit that is ahead of upstream and push it to refs/for/<branch>.

commands.title: Gerrit Review Push: Pick Commit to Push

localGerritPush.remote.description: Default Git remote name used for Gerrit push (used to build the default command prefix).

localGerritPush.targetBranches.description: Target branches for Gerrit push. Defaults to only 'master' for first use; you can add more in the UI.

localGerritPush.limit.description: Max number of commits shown in the picker.

localGerritPush.includeMergeCommits.description: Include merge commits in the picker.

localGerritPush.verifyRemoteHead.description: Verify remote branch head via `git ls-remote` for more accurate ahead detection (slower).

localGerritPush.openAfterPush.description: Open Gerrit in browser automatically after a successful push.
